name: WAR Chess (itch)
description:
Wizard Alien Robot 3 player battle chess!

WAR Chess is a 3 player, asymmetrical turn based strategy, real time fighting game prototype I made for Uni. Use spells and abilities to turn the tide of the battle when on the board and fight to kill the other players' units in one on one, arena fights. Last team standing or whoever controls the centre of the board for the longest will win. Might update in the future.
